about_the_game:
This DLC contains the following:
Esther-Lace nightdress：

Pure White bracers*1:Witness the girl's innocent pure white bracers, pray under the starry night, and may the brilliance of the stars spread all over the world to protect the world.

White Ring*1：Escape the gloomy past and chase the hopeful future, pure white roses bloom in the palms of hands, blessings will last forever.

Sincere Oath*1：To witness the sword of the vow agreed by the two, even if the hope is so slim, the brilliance of the stars will eventually penetrate into the dark night sky.

Pure White Nightdress*1：The sleeveless pajamas that accompany the son of the stars through the long midnight, the pure white moon reflects the girl's innocence and sadness.

Players can equip each skin for entertainment in the skins in the equipment menu.
detailed_description:
This DLC contains the following:
Esther-Lace nightdress：

Pure White bracers*1:Witness the girl's innocent pure white bracers, pray under the starry night, and may the brilliance of the stars spread all over the world to protect the world.

White Ring*1：Escape the gloomy past and chase the hopeful future, pure white roses bloom in the palms of hands, blessings will last forever.

Sincere Oath*1：To witness the sword of the vow agreed by the two, even if the hope is so slim, the brilliance of the stars will eventually penetrate into the dark night sky.

Pure White Nightdress*1：The sleeveless pajamas that accompany the son of the stars through the long midnight, the pure white moon reflects the girl's innocence and sadness.

Players can equip each skin for entertainment in the skins in the equipment menu.
developers: 苏州天魂网络科技股份有限公司
name: God Souls：Esther:Nightdress Fashion

subs.option_text: 魂之起源 God Souls：伊丝特:睡裙时装 - $2.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated/independent
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated/independent
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster

supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
